org.kite.async

Class AsyncHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.kite.async.AsyncHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.reflect.InvocationHandler

    public class AsyncHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.reflect.InvocationHandler
    A proxy class for invoking async methods.
    See Also:
    AsyncMethod, AsyncResult

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Object getProxy() 
      java.lang.Object invoke(java.lang.Object proxy, java.lang.reflect.Method method, java.lang.Object[] args)
      void setResultQueue(ResultQueue resultQueue)
      Sets the result queue where methods results will be delivered.
      static AsyncHandler wrapAll(java.lang.Object origin, java.lang.Class<?> type, java.util.concurrent.Executor executor)
      Creates new AsyncHandler that will invoke all methods of given type interface of origin object on given executor.
      static AsyncHandler wrapMethods(java.lang.Object origin, java.lang.Class<?> type, java.util.concurrent.Executor executor)
      Creates new AsyncHandler that will invoke only methods marked with AsyncMethod annotation of given type interface of origin object on given executor.

      • wrapAll

        public static AsyncHandler wrapAll(java.lang.Object origin,
                   java.lang.Class<?> type,
                   java.util.concurrent.Executor executor)
        Creates new AsyncHandler that will invoke all methods of given type interface of origin object on given executor.
        Parameters:
        origin - original holder of interface
        type - interface, which methods will be wrapped
        executor - where original methods will be invoked
        Returns:
        new AsyncHandler

      • wrapMethods

        public static AsyncHandler wrapMethods(java.lang.Object origin,
                       java.lang.Class<?> type,
                       java.util.concurrent.Executor executor)
        Creates new AsyncHandler that will invoke only methods marked with AsyncMethod annotation of given type interface of origin object on given executor.
        Parameters:
        origin - original holder of interface
        type - interface, which methods will be wrapped
        executor - where original methods will be invoked
        Returns:
        new AsyncHandler

      • getProxy

        public java.lang.Object getProxy()
        Returns:
        proxy instance which will catch methods invocation.

      • setResultQueue

        public void setResultQueue(ResultQueue resultQueue)
        Sets the result queue where methods results will be delivered. Note, that setting null (which is default) will make this handler to not deliver results anywhere
        Parameters:
        resultQueue -
